mapper.select:
SELECT ber.`id`, ber.`uid`, (select bc.uname from b_user bc where bc.uid = ber.uid) as uname, (select bc.mobile from b_user bc where bc.uid = ber.uid) as umobile, (select bc.company_name from b_user bc where bc.uid = ber.uid) as companyName, (select bc.user_role from b_user bc where bc.uid = ber.uid) as userRole, ber.`gid`, (select bc.goods_name from b_goods_info bc where bc.gid = ber.gid) as gname, (select bc.points from b_goods_info bc where bc.gid = ber.gid) as gpoints, ber.`points`, ber.`ex_status`, ber.`create_time`, ber.`update_time` FROM b_exchange_record ber
and exists (select 1 from b_user bc where bc.`uid` = ber.`uid` and bc.uname like concat('%',#{username},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_user bc where bc.`uid` = ber.`uid` and bc.mobile like concat('%',#{usermobile},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_user bc where bc.`uid` = ber.`uid` and bc.company_name like concat('%',#{ucomponyName},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_goods_info bc where bc.`gid` = ber.`gid` and bc.goods_name like concat('%',#{gdname},'%'))
and ber.`ex_status` = #{exStatus}
ORDER BY ber.id DESC
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM b_exchange_record WHERE id IN
#{id}
